bcbioRNASeq 0.2.10

Count matrix accessors

Source: R/counts-methods.R
counts.Rd

By default, counts() returns the raw counts. Normalized counts, including transcripts per million (TPM) can be accessed using the "normalized" argument.

counts(object, ...)

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq
counts(object, normalized = FALSE)

Arguments

object

Object.
normalized

string or boolean. Which normalization method to apply:

  • FALSE: Raw counts (tximport).

  • TRUE: DESeq2 normalized counts. Calculated on the fly.

  • "tpm": Transcripts per million (tximport).

  • "vst": DESeq2 log2 variance stabilizing transformation.

  • "rlog": DESeq2 log2 regularized log transformation.

  • "tmm": edgeR trimmed mean of M-values. Calculated on the fly.

  • "rle": Relative log expression transformation.
...

Additional arguments.

Value

matrix.

See also

  • tpm().

  • tmm().

  • DESeq2::counts().

  • DESeq2::rlog().

  • DESeq2::varianceStabilizingTransformation().

Other Data Functions: metrics, tmm

Examples

# bcbioRNASeq ====
counts(bcb_small, normalized = FALSE) %>% summary()
#>   control_rep1       control_rep2       control_rep3       fa_day7_rep1     
#>  Min.   :       0   Min.   :       0   Min.   :       0   Min.   :       1  
#>  1st Qu.:     419   1st Qu.:     904   1st Qu.:     317   1st Qu.:     579  
#>  Median :    1389   Median :    3397   Median :    1315   Median :    1725  
#>  Mean   :   43568   Mean   :   86384   Mean   :   41167   Mean   :   39351  
#>  3rd Qu.:    4692   3rd Qu.:   11303   3rd Qu.:    4125   3rd Qu.:    5373  
#>  Max.   :11767239   Max.   :22627793   Max.   :11608372   Max.   :10623916  
#>   fa_day7_rep2      fa_day7_rep3     
#>  Min.   :      0   Min.   :       0  
#>  1st Qu.:    501   1st Qu.:     769  
#>  Median :   1557   Median :    1904  
#>  Mean   :  34610   Mean   :   42438  
#>  3rd Qu.:   4840   3rd Qu.:    5304  
#>  Max.   :9676254   Max.   :12145225  
counts(bcb_small, normalized = TRUE) %>% summary()
#>   control_rep1       control_rep2       control_rep3       fa_day7_rep1     
#>  Min.   :       0   Min.   :       0   Min.   :       0   Min.   :       1  
#>  1st Qu.:     512   1st Qu.:     476   1st Qu.:     435   1st Qu.:     578  
#>  Median :    1695   Median :    1788   Median :    1803   Median :    1723  
#>  Mean   :   53193   Mean   :   45465   Mean   :   56458   Mean   :   39307  
#>  3rd Qu.:    5728   3rd Qu.:    5949   3rd Qu.:    5657   3rd Qu.:    5367  
#>  Max.   :14366610   Max.   :11909307   Max.   :15920023   Max.   :10611940  
#>   fa_day7_rep2       fa_day7_rep3     
#>  Min.   :       0   Min.   :       0  
#>  1st Qu.:     575   1st Qu.:     758  
#>  Median :    1787   Median :    1878  
#>  Mean   :   39712   Mean   :   41851  
#>  3rd Qu.:    5554   3rd Qu.:    5231  
#>  Max.   :11102734   Max.   :11977303  
counts(bcb_small, normalized = "tpm") %>% summary()
#>   control_rep1        control_rep2       control_rep3       fa_day7_rep1      
#>  Min.   :     0.00   Min.   :     0.0   Min.   :     0.0   Min.   :     0.45

#>  3rd Qu.:   184.63   3rd Qu.:   181.8   3rd Qu.:   219.1   3rd Qu.:   254.47  
#>  Max.   :292758.61   Max.   :320187.5   Max.   :337651.9   Max.   :272312.78  
#>   fa_day7_rep2        fa_day7_rep3      
#>  Min.   :     0.00   Min.   :     0.00  
#>  1st Qu.:    92.77   1st Qu.:    78.54  
#>  Median :   138.55   Median :   117.01

#>  3rd Qu.:   236.03   3rd Qu.:   210.51  
#>  Max.   :291312.78   Max.   :270608.66  
counts(bcb_small, normalized = "vst") %>% summary()
#>   control_rep1     control_rep2     control_rep3     fa_day7_rep1
